column1: Art Institute of Chicago////The one hour suggested "must sees" on the back of the brochure are a fairly accurate way to gauge how to spend your time if you only have a short amount of it. They've got Van Goghs
column3: and all that nice impressionist stuff on the second floor
column4: that's probably what was most popular. I'd recommend dedicating more time to this facility as it's somewhat overwhelming if you're just looking to browse.
